MATT 5.46 jabai auk frijoþ þans frijondans izwis ainans, ƕo mizdono habaiþ?
niu jah þai þiudo þata samo taujand?
MATT 5.47 jah jabai goleiþ þans frijonds izwarans þatainei, ƕe managizo taujiþ?
niu jah motarjos þata samo taujand?
MATT 5.48 sijaiþ nu jus fullatojai, swaswe atta izwar sa in himinam fullatojis ist.
MATT 6.1 Atsaiƕiþ armaion izwara ni taujan in andwairþja manne du saiƕan im;
aiþþau laun ni habaiþ fram attin izwaramma þamma in himinam.
MATT 6.2 þan nu taujais armaion, ni haurnjais faura þus, swaswe þai liutans taujand in gaqumþim jah in garunsim, ei hauhjaindau fram mannam;
amen qiþa izwis:
andnemun mizdon seina.

MATT 6.3 iþ þuk taujandan armaion ni witi hleidumei þeina, ƕa taujiþ taihswo þeina, MATT 6.4 ei sijai so armahairtiþa þeina in fulhsnja, jah atta þeins saei saiƕiþ in fulhsnja, usgibiþ þus in bairhtein.
MATT 6.5 jah þan bidjaiþ, ni sijaiþ swaswe þai liutans,
unte frijond in gaqumþim jah waihstam plapjo standandans bidjan, ei gaumjaindau mannam.
Amen, qiþa izwis þatei haband mizdon seina.
MATT 6.6 iþ þu þan bidjais, gagg in heþjon þeina jah galukands haurdai þeinai bidei du attin þeinamma þamma in fulhsnja, jah atta þeins saei saiƕiþ in fulhsnja, usgibiþ þus in bairhtein.
MATT 6.7 bidjandans-uþ-þan ni filuwaurdjaiþ, swaswe þai þiudo;
þugkeiþ im auk ei in filuwaurdein seinai andhausjaindau.
MATT 6.8 ni galeikoþ nu þaim;
wait auk atta izwar þizei jus þaurbuþ, faurþizei jus bidjaiþ ina.
MATT 6.9 swa nu bidjaiþ jus:
atta unsar þu in himinam, weihnai namo þein.
MATT 6.10 qimai þiudinassus þeins.
wairþai wilja þeins, swe in himina jah ana airþai.
MATT 6.11 hlaif unsarana þana sinteinan gif uns himma daga.
MATT 6.12 jah aflet uns þatei skulans sijaima, swaswe jah weis afletam þaim skulam unsaraim.
MATT 6.13 jah ni briggais uns in fraistubnjai, ak lausei uns af þamma ubilin;
unte þeina ist þiudangardi jah mahts jah wulþus in aiwins.
amen.
MATT 6.14 unte jabai afletiþ mannam missadedins ize, afletiþ jah izwis atta izwar sa ufar himinam.
MATT 6.15 iþ jabai ni afletiþ mannam missadedins ize, ni þau atta izwar afletiþ missadedins izwaros.
MATT 6.16 aþþan biþe fastaiþ, ni wairþaiþ swaswe þai liutans gaurai;
frawardjand auk andwairþja seina, ei gasaiƕaindau mannam fastandans.
amen, qiþa izwis, þatei andnemun mizdon seina.
MATT 6.17 iþ þu fastands salbo haubiþ þein jah ludja þeina þwah, MATT 6.18 ei ni gasaiƕaizau mannam fastands, ak attin þeinamma þamma in fulhsnja, jah atta þeins saei saiƕiþ in fulhsnja, usgibiþ þus.
MATT 6.19 ni huzdjaiþ izwis huzda ana airþai, þarei malo jah nidwa frawardeiþ, jah þarei þiubos ufgraband jah hlifand.
MATT 6.20 iþ huzdjaiþ izwis huzda in himina, þarei nih malo nih nidwa frawardeiþ, jah þarei þiubos ni ufgraband nih stiland.
MATT 6.21 þarei auk ist huzd izwar, þaruh ist jah hairto izwar.
MATT 6.22 lukarn leikis ist augo:
jabai nu augo þein ainfalþ ist, allata leik þein liuhadein wairþiþ;
MATT 6.23 iþ jabai augo þein unsel ist, allata leik þein riqizein wairþiþ.
jabai nu liuhaþ þata in þus riqiz ist, þata riqiz ƕan filu!
MATT 6.24 ni manna mag twaim fraujam skalkinon;
unte jabai fijaiþ ainana, jah anþarana frijoþ; aiþþau ainamma ufhauseiþ, iþ anþaramma frakann.
ni maguþ guda skalkinon jah mammonin.
MATT 6.25 Duþþe qiþa izwis:
ni maurnaiþ saiwalai izwarai ƕa matjaiþ jah ƕa drigkaiþ, nih leika izwaramma ƕe wasjaiþ;
niu saiwala mais ist fodeinai jah leik wastjom?
MATT 6.26 insaiƕiþ du fuglam himinis, þei ni saiand nih sneiþand, nih lisand in banstins, jah atta izwar sa ufar himinam fodeiþ ins.
niu jus mais wulþrizans sijuþ þaim?
MATT 6.27 iþ ƕas izwara maurnands mag anaaukan ana wahstu seinana aleina aina?
